scripts.build-loader: ./bin/build bin/loader-browser-manifest.js dist/loader-browser.js ./src true true JS && rm ./dist/loader-browser.js && stat -f%z ./dist/loader-browser.min.js
scripts.build-myt: ./bin/build src/js/myt/manifest.js dist/myt.js ./src true true myt.all && stat -f%z ./dist/myt.min.js
scripts.build-tym: ./bin/build src/js/tym/manifest.js dist/tym.js ./src true true tym.all && stat -f%z ./dist/tym.min.js
